name: Netley Whirl
details: Upper Material: Leather
Lining Material: Textile
Heel Height: 2,5 cm
Sole Material: TR

reviews.title: Beautifully made boot
reviews.content: I bought this in the extra wide size but unfortunately my calf could not be accommodated. I am gutted because the boot is beautifully made and exceptionally stylish and wish it could have fitted me. The postal service was brilliant too. Can't fault Clarks just my shape!

name: Calla Rose
details: Upper Material: Leather
Lining Material: Textile
Heel Height: 6,5 cm
Sole Material: TPU

reviews.title: Comfortable great looking shoes
reviews.content: I bought these shoes 2 weeks ago and have worn them on 3 occasions since. They are shoes that look good but are also comfortable to wear. Happy that I bought them. The wide fit was a bonus.

reviews.title: The best ever!
reviews.content: I bought these for my girlfriend and she absolutly loved it. The design is very nice, they are also very confortable. She has used them as soon as they arrived!
